title: Lab Notebook RAG – Conversational Search Engine for Researchers
description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that transforms handwritten and digital lab notebook entries into a searchable database with free-text query and summary capabilities. Ideal for institutional memory, reproducibility, and knowledge retrieval in biological labs.

title: Cell-SideBot: Automated Assistant for Image-Based Research Workflows
description: A custom chatbot/workflow tool designed for image-analysis teams: it integrates processed image metrics and metadata into conversational queries, helping researchers ask ‘what did we do here?’ or ‘which images show this pattern?’ in natural language.

title: Pub-RAG: Literature Intelligence Agent for Biologists
description: An intelligent literature assistant that uses RAG techniques to ingest PubMed (and other scientific) articles, extract actionable summaries, and provide biologists with the most relevant insights for their hypotheses or workflows.

title: Video: Building a Lab Notebook RAG System (Demo & Walk-through)
description: A detailed walkthrough video showing how to build and deploy a lab notebook RAG system: from OCR of handwritten notes to conversational querying in a deployed interface.

title: Video: Literature Intelligence Agent for Biologists (Demo)
description: A demo video illustrating how the Pub-RAG system supports biologists in summarizing and querying scientific literature quickly and effectively.
